Although in math "Pia" does not exist, I can give you "Pi".. The first 1000 (not counting the three) digits are:. 3.141592653589793238462643383. 27950288419716939937510582097. 49445923078164062862089986280. 34825342117067982148086513282. 30664709384460955058223172535. 94081284811174502841027019385. 21105559644622948954930381964. 42881097566593344612847564823. 37867831652712019091456485669. 23460348610454326648213393607. 26024914127372458700660631558. 81748815209209628292540917153. 64367892590360011330530548820. 46652138414695194151160943305. 72703657595919530921861173819. 32611793105118548074462379962. 74956735188575272489122793818. 30119491298336733624406566430. 86021394946395224737190702179. 86094370277053921717629317675. 23846748184676694051320005681. 27145263560827785771342757789. 60917363717872146844090122495. 34301465495853710507922796892. 58923542019956112129021960864. 03441815981362977477130996051. 87072113499999983729780499510. 59731732816096318595024459455. 34690830264252230825334468503. 52619311881710100031378387528. 86587533208381420617177669147. 30359825349042875546873115956. 28638823537875937519577818577. 80532171226806613001927876611. 1959092164201989.. Although pi is never ending, most people don't need to use any more than the first five digits. If you do, here you go.
